attributes.additional_details:
The Aim of the Motors.co.uk Rear Facing child car seats awareness campaign is to:

1.	The Department of Transport to admit that both Group 0 and Group 1 rear facing car seats are safer for children until the age of four (or until 20 – 40lbs) and to officially recommend Group 1 models to parents

2.	Department of Transport to clarify the law for both Group 0 and Group 1 rear facing car seats
